description:
We Supply and Fit High-Quality 4x4 Rear Bars and Tow Bars in Coffs Harbour

Automax 4x4 offers a complete range of towing accessories from the best brands in Australia. In fact, we supply and fit 4x4 rear bars and tow bars in Coffs Harbour in our own workshop. So, if you're searching for the best rear bars, wheel carriers, tow bars, wiring kits, tow hitches, and towing accessories, look no further! We have the towing equipment for any sort of towing. From trailers for work to towing a caravan or boat, or hauling a camper, we've got you covered. Furthermore, we only offer the best brands. They include Rhino 4X4, AFN, Rival by Drivetech, Uneek, and Rockarmour. [su_spoiler title="More"]

Workshop and Showroom for 4x4 Rear Bars and Tow Bars in Coffs Harbour

Why not visit our 4x4 Accessories showroom in Coffs Harbour? We'll take you through all of your options and make sure you leave with the perfect solution. Also, our comprehensive service includes fitting in our own full workshop. So, call in today for a friendly chat with our 4WD towing experts and organise your best towing option.

Automax 4x4 Accessories and Services

As a comprehensive one-stop-shop for everything 4WD in Coffs Harbour, we offer the following services:

  1. 4x4 Accessories advice, supply and fitting
  2. 4x4 Bullbars from Rhino, AFN, Uneek, Rival by Drivetech, Rockarmour and More
  3. 4x4 Rear Bars & Tow Bars including sales and fitting
  4. 4x4 Sliders and Side steps, brands we stock are AFN, Rhino, Rockarmour
  5. 4x4 Lighting. We offer the best 4WD LED Lighting by Stedi Lights
  6. 4x4 Suspension by Outback Armour and Boss Air Suspension
  7. 4x4 Winches & Recovery Gear by Runva, Rhino, Drivetech & Outback Armour
  8. 4x4 Vehicle repair, servicing and 4WD upgrades in Coffs Harbour
Contact us today or call in to our Showroom for expert advice on a great range of 4x4 Rear Bars and Tow Bars in Coffs Harbour.
[/su_spoiler]
name: Rear Bars / Towbars
